headline: DTE Energy (DTE): Evaluating Whether Recent Share Price Softness Signals a Valuation Opportunity
summary: DTE Energy (DTE) has been drifting slightly lower over the past month even as its one year total return stays in double digits. That mix of near term softness and steady longer term gains has investors reassessing the stock’s setup. See our latest analysis for DTE Energy. At around $130.75, the share price has cooled off after a solid run, with a 30 day share price return of negative 6.46 percent contrasting with a sturdier 1 year total shareholder return of 11.91 percent. This suggests...
